mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product VALUES (0, #{categoryId}, #{productName}, #{cost}, #{price}, #{profit}, #{productImg}, #{productInfoImg}, false, now(), #{orderCnt}, 'N', #{productType}, #{registId})
mapper.update: UPDATE Product SET categoryId = #{categoryId}, productName = #{productName}, cost = #{cost}, price = #{price}, profit = #{profit}, productImg = #{productImg}, productInfoImg = #{productInfoImg}, soldOut = false, regDate = now(), orderCnt = #{orderCnt}, productDelete = 'N', productType = #{productType}, registId = #{registId} WHERE productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM Product p JOIN ProductCategory pc ON p.categoryId = pc.categoryId WHERE (pc.parentCategoryId = #{id} OR pc.categoryId = #{id}) AND productDelete = 'N';
SELECT productId, productName, price, productImg, regDate, orderCnt FROM Product WHERE productDelete = 'N' AND productType = 1 ORDER BY orderCnt DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT productId, productName, price, productImg, regDate, orderCnt FROM Product WHERE productDelete = 'N' AND productType = 1 ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 10;
